channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Limebike in river, high pollution risk, 23rd July
item.description:
Limebike dumped in river shuttle, as the bike is actually sunmerged the battery will contaminate the river. Can you please remove ASAP.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 118, Willersley Avenue, Blackfen, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water leaking, 23rd July
item.description:
Outside tanning shop theres a mains wear water is coming from in br1 1LF it’s been like this when we had heavy rain a lot of water as been washed can you get on to water department and tell them what as happened

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, High Street, Widmore, London

item.title: Recent council street sapling planting low branches obstructing footway use for able bodied persons, disabled / blind / partially- sighted people near 9, Cator Rd, Penge (about 20m from the Lennard Rd junction), 23rd July
item.description:
Recent council street sapling planting low branches obstructing footway use for able bodied persons, disabled / blind / partially- sighted people near 9, Cator Rd, Penge (about 20m from the Lennard Rd junction). Branch is at about 4 feet height. Please prune to 2m clearance.

item.title: Cator Road corner with Lennard Rd, Penge tilted and dangerous for wheelchair users, 23rd July
item.description:
The footway in Cator Road at the corner with Lennard Rd, Penge, slopes into the gutter and is difficult and dangerous to use in a motorised wheelchair throwing the chair and occupant towards the road. If this was once a dropped kerb, there is no match on the opposite corner. There is a formal crossing with tactile paving and a refuge 3m further along. Please raise the kerb edge and level the footway so that the corner is level to use by those with wheelchairs etc. I am reporting this for the disabled elderly friend in the picture who lives nearby and regularly has difficulty turning this corner.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 66, Lennard Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement obstruction, illegal parking, 23rd July
item.description:
Two cars blocked the pedestrian footway on High Road N20, forcing me and my mother (in a wheelchair) to go onto the road, which was very dangerous. • Red BMW (RJ03 ZNS) – 23/07, 13:16, outside 1260 High Road N20 9HH • Grey Audi (LM74 SVD) – 23/07, 14:33, outside 1262 High Road N20 9HH This is a clear obstruction and illegal pavement parking under the Greater London Council Act. Please take enforcement action to prevent this from recurring.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1268, High Road, Whetstone, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole, 23rd July
item.description:
This pothole had not been fixed & is getting bigger. The road around it has been tarmacked but the problem not fixed. You can see various attempts as temporary fixes but your just papering over cracks & not fixing the actual problem

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): West Street, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet
